info.senderName: NWS El Paso Tx/Santa Teresa NM
info.headline: Dust Storm Warning issued July 8 at 3:20PM MDT until July 8 at 4:15PM MDT by NWS El Paso Tx/Santa Teresa NM
info.description:
The National Weather Service in El Paso has issued a
* Dust Storm Warning for... Central Dona Ana County in south central New Mexico...
* Until 415 PM MDT.
* At 319 PM MDT, a haboob was near Dona Ana, moving southwest at 15 mph.
HAZARD...Less than a quarter mile visibility with strong wind in excess of 50 mph.
SOURCE...Traffic cameras.
IMPACT...Dangerous life-threatening travel.
* This includes the following highways... Interstate 10 in New Mexico between mile markers 132 and 145. Interstate 25 in New Mexico between mile markers 1 and 22. Highway 70 in New Mexico between mile markers 150 and 157.
Locations impacted include... Leasburg, Las Cruces, Radium Springs, NMSU Main Campus, Dona Ana, Mesilla, Fairacres, Talavera, East Mesa, San Pablo, Picacho, Portions of Jornada Experimental Range, Hill, Northeast Las Cruces, Corralitos, Las Cruces West Mesa, Fort Selden State Historic Site, Mesilla Valley Bosque State Park, and Leasburg Dam State Park.
info.instruction:
Dust storms lead to dangerous driving conditions with visibility reduced to near zero. If driving, avoid dust storms if possible. If caught in one, pull off the road, turn off your lights and keep your foot off the brake.
Motorists should not drive into a dust storm. PULL ASIDE STAY ALIVE!

parameter.value: NWS: DUST STORM WARNING til 4:15 PM MDT. Be ready for a sudden drop to zero visibility.

National Weather Service: DUST STORM WARNING for this area until 4:15 PM MDT. Be ready for sudden drop to zero visibility. Pull Aside, Stay Alive! When visibility drops, pull far off the road and put your vehicle in park. Turn the lights off and keep your foot off the brake. Infants, the elderly and those with respiratory issues urged to take precautions.

parameter.value: SNM: AVISO DE TORMENTA DE POLVO hasta las 4:15 PM MDT. Espere reduccion de visibilidad.

AVISO DE TORMENTA DE POLVO hasta las 4:15 PM MDT. Estar alerta para una reduccion repentina en visibilidad. Cuando la visibilidad disminuya, mueva su vehiculo fuera de la carretera. Apague las luces y mantenga su pie fuera del freno. Se recomienda enfaticamente el tomar precauciones para los infantes, ancianos y personas con problemas respiratorios.
